item.title: FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: Quick Tips for a successful pitch
item.dc:creator: B-BIC
item.description:
Keep pitch short and focused on the technology and its commercial application. Limit the discussion of preliminary results, and focus on the most relevant results with conclusions – not data. Present the science within the context of the business strategy. This event will provide you with the opportunity to pitch a team of experts on your research.…

The post FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: Quick Tips for a successful pitch appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.
item.content:encoded:
• Keep pitch short and focused on the technology and its commercial application.
  • Limit the discussion of preliminary results, and focus on the most relevant results with conclusions – not data.
  • Present the science within the context of the business strategy.

This event will provide you with the opportunity to pitch a team of experts on your research. You will receive immediate feedback with the opportunity to apply for our grant programs which can provide up to $350,000 per project, business coaching, and project management.

REGISTER HERE

 

 

The post FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: Quick Tips for a successful pitch appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.

item.title: FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: FAQ
item.dc:creator: B-BIC
item.description:
Q:  Do I need to have slides?  A:  Pitches only need to address the suggested elements.  Use of reference materials or other visual elements is welcome if they help convey the product concept and can be shared using your laptop screen.  AV equipment will not be available. The post FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: FAQ appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.
item.content:encoded:
Q:  Do I need to have slides? 

A:  Pitches only need to address the suggested elements.  Use of reference materials or other visual elements is welcome if they help convey the product concept and can be shared using your laptop screen.  AV equipment will not be available.

Q:  How formal will the pitches be?

A:  You will be pitching to 1-2 experienced biotech executives with everyone seated around a table.  There will be multiple tables in the room where other investigators will also be pitching.  Allow time for their questions and be prepared for them to ask several questions.

Q:  Can I present confidential information?

A:  Everyone hearing the pitches has signed confidentiality agreements.  However, since you will be pitching in an area where others may overhear or see your information we urge everyone to use their judgment when deciding what to share.

This event will provide you with the opportunity to pitch a team of experts on your research. You will receive immediate feedback with the opportunity to apply for our grant programs which can provide up to $350,000 per project, business coaching, and project management.

REGISTER HERE

 

 

 

The post FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: FAQ appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.

The post EVENT: FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.
item.content:encoded:
ARE YOU THINKING ABOUT COMMERCIALIZING YOUR RESEARCH?

Fast Pitch for Funding is an event hosted by the Boston Biomedical Innovation Center, that provides you the opportunity to pitch a team of experts on your research. You will receive immediate feedback with the opportunity to apply for our grant programs which can provide up to $350,000 per project, business coaching, and project management.

  • Pitches for awards should fulfill unmet clinical needs in the areas of heart, lung, blood, and sleep disorders.
  • Pitches should emphasize potential commercial value.
  • Presentations should be no longer than 10 minutes.
  • Pitch slide decks are welcome, but not expected.
  • ** Only Faculty from B-BIC member institutions are eligible to apply.

For more information, please feel free to contact us.   You can REGISTER HERE.

DATE AND TIME
Mon, March 5, 2018
2:00 PM – 4:00 PM EST
LOCATION

MASS GENERAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE

SIMCHES RESEARCH BUILDING
185 Cambridge StreetBoston, MA

 

FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: Quick Tips for a successful pitch

FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING: What we are looking for when awarding B-BIC partnerships

For more information, please feel free to contact us.   You can REGISTER HERE.

The post EVENT: FAST PITCH FOR FUNDING appeared first on Boston Biomedical Innovation Center.
